modName: But..... The Future Refused To Change
summary: This mod just plays a short video when you are killed in game.  This is meant to be used with my Chrono Trigger Mod.
descriptionHtml:
[youtube]VIlGi1SFSNg[/youtube]


This mod just plays a short video when you are killed in game.  This is meant to be used with my Chrono Trigger Mod.
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/55719/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/55719/?[/url]

This video is approximately 30 seconds.  If you would like a shorter or longer version let me know and I will upload it.

Install with NMM
Or Manual Install.  Place the ESP in the Skyrim/data folder.  Place the video in Skyrim/Data/Video folder.  And place the script in the Skyrim/Data/Scripts folder


Credits and Permission To Use
Music by Fenix Ark Angelus
The Day The World Revived
[url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=55i4IDGJ73E&list=UUD2LbwVfIX0I_CuzjBQPmwg]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=55i4IDGJ73E&list=UUD2LbwVfIX0I_CuzjBQPmwg[/url]

Picture/Video created by myself using Gimp and Windows Movie Maker
author: Ex0rdium
